Workflow.Name: replaceSpacesWithPlus
Workflow.Value: cmdgen bizRul,replaceSpacesWithPlus,`Hello My Name Is: Blaaa` 4

Workflow.Name: cleanCarriageReturnFromString
Workflow.Value: cmdgen bizRul,cleanCarriageReturnFromString,`This is a string with many newline characters.` 4

Workflow.Name: characterStringParsing
Workflow.Value: cmdSeq wrkflo,singleQuoteSwapAfterEquals wrkflo,swapForwardSlashToBackSlash wrkflo,swapBackSlashToForwardSlash wrkflo,swapDoubleForwardSlashToSingleForwardSlash wrkflo,swapDoubleBackSlashToSingleBackSlash wrkflo,replaceSpacesWithPlus wrkflo,replaceColonWithUnderscore wrkflo,cleanCarriageReturnFromString wrkflo,convertStringToLowerCase wrkflo,convertStringToUpperCase
